list.title: SlideShow
list.description: It initializes the widget.

list.title: SlideShow#callbacksHTMLEl
list.description: List of callbacks to set when the window is created

list.title: SlideShow#createDefaultTextureFile
list.description: It creates a new texture file object with the default texture and returns it

list.title: SlideShow#createPlane
list.description: It creates a PlaneGeometry and a MeshBasicMaterial, to create the Mesh this.plane

list.title: SlideShow#domElement
list.description: Root html of slideshow view

list.title: SlideShow#getSizeValues
list.description: Get size values contained in inputs elements in DOM

list.title: SlideShow#initCBDrop
list.description: Set the callback function of event 'drop' @warn !event.preventDefault!

list.title: SlideShow#initDefaultTexture
list.description: Create a default texture and put in this.defaultTexture

list.title: SlideShow#initHtml
list.description: Create all HTMLElements and fill this.domElement

list.title: SlideShow#initInputListener
list.description: Add event listeners to input

list.title: SlideShow#inputVectorToVector
list.description: Convert inputVector HTMLElement to THREE.Vector

list.title: SlideShow#loopSlideShow
list.description: Loop through a slide show of textures

list.title: SlideShow#matchExtent
list.description: It sets the size, coordinates and rotation inputs to the values of the extent

list.title: SlideShow#matchRatio
list.description: Function called when aspectRatio is checked

list.title: SlideShow#modifyPlane
list.description: Modify this.plane {THREE.Mesh}

list.title: SlideShow#notifyValue
list.description: if true the application update its view3D eachFrame

list.title: SlideShow#setSlideshowInConfig
list.description: It loads the textures and videos of the slideshow and stores them in the this.textureFiles array

list.title: SlideShow#setTexture
list.description: Set this.currentTexture

list.title: SlideShow#textureFiles
list.description: List of textures with data

list.title: SlideShow#updateVectors
list.description: Update vectors variables with the values contained in inputs elements in DOM
